meanings.definition: Full of or showing high-spirited merriment
meanings.sent1: The children's faces lit up with mirthful smiles during the funny puppet show.
meanings.sent2: Her mirthful laughter echoed through the room, spreading joy to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The mirthful clown made silly faces to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: The mirthful atmosphere at the party was like a burst of colorful confetti.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's jokes were so mirthful that even the grumpiest person couldn't help but chuckle.

meanings.sent1: The comedian's mirthful performance had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent2: His mirthful jokes always lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent3: The mirthful movie had everyone in the theater giggling uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The mirthful cartoon characters brought smiles to children's faces worldwide.
meanings.sent5: The mirthful banter between friends made the evening unforgettable.
